synopsis.text: One honor student, one self-proclaimed pervert, and a shared secret that binds them together. Nana, the epitome of academic excellence, and Kaoru, a 17-year-old with a notorious reputation, find themselves entangled in a world of S&M, a shared passion that transcends their seemingly disparate lives. As Nana grapples with the pressure to maintain her perfect image and academic prowess, she finds an unexpected release in Kaoru's unconventional hobby. When a chance encounter with Kaoru's S&M toys sparks an intriguing curiosity in Nana, the two embark on a clandestine journey of self-discovery and shared pleasure. As they navigate through their unique relationship, they find solace in their 'breathers,' moments that offer Nana a respite from her stressful life. Prepare to delve into an unconventional tale of friendship, desire, and the unexpected places where they intertwine.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
